members.signatureBeforeChange: private URL[] buildClasspath( final ArrayList files )         throws MalformedURLException
members.signatureAfterChange: private URL[] buildClasspath( final File[] files )         throws MalformedURLException
diff: -    private URL[] buildClasspath( final ArrayList files )
+    private URL[] buildClasspath( final File[] files )
-        final URL[] urls = new URL[ files.size() ];
-        final int count = files.size();
-        for( int i = 0; i < count; i++ )
+        final URL[] urls = new URL[ files.length ];
+        for( int i = 0; i < files.length; i++ )
-            final File file = (File)files.get( i );
-            urls[ i ] = file.toURL();
+            urls[ i ]  = files[i ].toURL();

members.signatureBeforeChange: private URL[] buildClasspath( final File file, final File[] dependencies )         throws MalformedURLException
members.signatureAfterChange: private URL[] buildClasspath( final ArrayList files )         throws MalformedURLException
diff: -    private URL[] buildClasspath( final File file, final File[] dependencies )
+    private URL[] buildClasspath( final ArrayList files )
-        final URL[] urls = new URL[ dependencies.length + 1 ];
-        for( int i = 0; i < dependencies.length; i++ )
+        final URL[] urls = new URL[ files.size() + 1 ];
+        final int count = files.size();
+        for( int i = 0; i < count; i++ )
-            urls[ i ] = dependencies[ i ].toURL();
+            final File file = (File)files.get( i );
+            urls[ i ] = file.toURL();
-        urls[ dependencies.length ] = file.toURL();
